attributes.action: make funding available to dual the A1237 York Northern ring road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A1237 Northern ring road is a vital part of York's transport network but this single carriageway is starting to resemble a parking lot and the only solution to this growing problem is to dual the road.

If there is not continued investment in our infrastructure here in York we will simply grind to a halt. The congestion level at the moment is starting to have a real impact on the local economy and our quality of life and this will only increase if action is not taken.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make funding available to dual the A1237 York Northern ring road."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16584


Prime Minister's Office
